mapper.insert: insert into zt_car_history_${month} ( dev_phone, car_number, gps_pos_x, gps_pos_y, gps_speed, gps_height, gps_direct, gps_valid, box_up, box_empty, box_close, car_state, car_weigui, driver_id, send_datetime, revice_datetime ) values ( '${locationInfo.devPhone}', '${locationInfo.carNumber}', ${locationInfo.gpsPosX}, ${locationInfo.gpsPosY}, ${locationInfo.gpsSpeed}, ${locationInfo.gpsHeight}, ${locationInfo.gpsDirect}, 1, ${locationInfo.boxUp}, ${locationInfo.boxEmpty}, ${locationInfo.boxClose}, '${locationInfo.carState}', ${locationInfo.carWeigui}, '${locationInfo.driverId}', '${locationInfo.sendDatetime}', now() )
